contributors: Shushtarī, Nūr Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh, -1610 or 1611, author.
item.title: Majālis al-muʼminīn.
notes: Paper; unpolished cream color paper with not visible watermarks; text of fol. 1b-3a enclosed in ruled border of blue and gold, rest of manuscript is without borders; black ink with rubrication and red overlining; numerous notes, corrections, etc. written on squares of very thin blue paper and pasted over parts of the text; catchwords.
Rieu, C. Catalogue of the Persian manuscripts, I, 337
Nastaʻliq; 37 lines in written area 30.5 x 14 cm.
Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M95.
Disbound; originally bound at top edge.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
medium: 1, 348 leaves (37 lines), paper : disbound ; 35.5 x 19 cm

contributor: shushtarī, nūr allāh ibn ʻabd allāh

title: Majālis al-muʼminīn.
description: Manuscript. Persian Title from fol. 2a. Scribe not identified. Written in Iran? Paper; unpolished cream color paper with not visible watermarks; text of fol. 1b-3a enclosed in ruled border of blue and gold, rest of manuscript is without borders; black ink with rubrication and red overlining; numerous notes, corrections, etc. written on squares of very thin blue paper and pasted over parts of the text; catchwords. Rieu, C. Catalogue of the Persian manuscripts, I, 337 Nastaʻliq; 37 lines in written area 30.5 x 14 cm. Fol. 1b-348b (incomplete). Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M95. Disbound; originally bound at top edge. Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
